Posts.Content: Can any one please help had double mastectomy and bilateral lymphs  8 week ago  and need bloods to be done and also having bone strengthening injections soon —— but nothing can be done in my arms, they have tried on three occasions in various parts of my feet but my veins keep collapsing and its so painful I have cried all day I’m dreading the bone strengthening treatment I’m not normally a wuss but I’ve had enough
Posts.Title: Needles in feet
